adventurePath.name: Animal Wilds
adventurePath.description:
This is a short and simple, three encounter adventure path included in the DawnniExpanded Mod.
It is intended for level 2 characters and takes place within city where you will be dealing with rampaging animals.
This AP is mainly a test of how modding creatures, adventure path and encounters work.
adventurePath.mediumRestFlavorText: Your heroes take a little rest to regain health.
